.NET 4 and FTP

Sep 29, 2010 | Posted in .NET, Programming

It comes baked in. Yay!

Update: Apparently seeing products that do FTP in .NET for years made me think this wasn’t built in. It’s been around since .NET 2.0… Another blogger has even created a helper class that encapsulates everything you want to do in .NET with FTP (and it works on mono!).
